articles.title: Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine shows strong immune response in elderly - All India Radio
articles.description: The Oxford-AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine candidate shows a strong immune response in adults in their 60s and 70s, according to researchers, raising hopes that it can protect age groups most at risk from the virus.

articles.title: T-cell abnormalities in severe COVID-19 cases - EurekAlert
articles.description: 新型冠状病毒感染的轻度和重度病例之间的主要区别被认为是T细胞针对病毒产生极端活性化。轻度病例情况下，转录因子Foxp3的诱导可阻止T细胞活性化。另一方面，在重症病例情况下，不会诱导Foxp3使T细胞活性化失控，从而引起严重的免疫反应
articles.content:
